p: An important feature to assess in the use of oils to enhance wound healing is the effect of the vehicle used in the formulation, since it can can influence the active ingredient effects [ 49]. In a previous research performed by our group, we found that using coffee oil grounds worsened the wound healing outcome, due to the formation of granulomas [ 18]. In the present work, we used a commercial sunflower oil (Saniplan, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil).
